name: Riddle of the Jelly
description:
Welcome to Riddle of the Jelly, a charming 2D platformer that's perfect for gamers of all ages! Our game features fun and light-hearted gameplay, with simple level design that's perfect for young children and casual players.

Join our adorable protagonist as they frolic through the mysterious world of the jelly, solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles along the way. With a cute character and whimsical visuals, Riddle of the Jelly is sure to put a smile on your face.

This game is perfect for families who want to play together or for anyone who enjoys a fun and engaging platformer. With challenging yet accessible gameplay, Riddle of the Jelly is sure to provide hours of entertainment.

So what are you waiting for? Come unlock the mystery of the Jelly and start playing today!
